articles.description: England face Australia in the first ODI in the Women’s Ashes – follow score updates, radio commentary and video highlights.
articles.title: Women’s Ashes 2025 LIVE: Australia vs England, first ODI, Sydney – cricket score, radio commentary, video highlights & updates

articles.description: The NFL's wildcard weekend gets underway - follow live text as the Chargers face the Texans and Steelers play the Ravens.
articles.title: NFL play-offs LIVE: LA Chargers vs Houston Texans & Pittsburgh Steelers vs Baltimore Ravens in wildcard weekend - scores & results

articles.description: Jack Grealish scores his first goal in over a year and James McAtee scores a second-half hat-trick as Manchester City surge to their biggest win since January 2019 to knock League Two Salford out of the FA Cup.
articles.title: Manchester City 8-0 Salford City: Jack Grealish ends drought in FA Cup romp

articles.description: Jasprit Bumrah will miss India's five-match T20 series against England but fellow fast bowler Mohammed Shami returns from injury.
articles.title: India vs England: Jasprit Bumrah to miss T20 series but Mohammed Shami returns

articles.description: Defender Tosin Adarabioyo scores twice as Chelsea cruise into the fourth round of the FA Cup with a win over League Two strugglers Morecambe.
articles.title: Chelsea 5-0 Morecambe: Tosin Adarabioyo scores twice in FA Cup win

articles.description: Gael Monfils makes history by becoming the oldest winner of an ATP Tour singles title after triumphing at the ASB Classic in Auckland.
articles.title: Gael Monfils becomes oldest ATP Tour champion with Auckland win

articles.description: Liverpool manager Arne Slot praises Trent Alexander-Arnold for brushing off last week's poor performance against Manchester United with an influential display in Saturday's 4-0 FA Cup victory over Accrington Stanley.
articles.title: Trent Alexander-Arnold: Liverpool full-back praised for reaction to criticism

articles.description: Lightweight Caroline Dubois retains her WBC world title after her contest with Jessica Camara ends in a frustrating technical draw because of a clash of heads.
articles.title: Caroline Dubois: Lightweight world-title with Jessica Camara contest ends in draw after clash of heads

articles.description: Plymouth Argyle interim boss Kevin Nancekivell hopes their win at Brentford will help put his side's season back on track.
articles.title: FA Cup: Plymouth Argyle hope to kick on after making 'history' at Brentford

articles.description: Nikola Vlasic's brilliant equaliser earns a point for Torino in the Turin derby against Juventus.
articles.title: Torino 1-1 Juventus: Nikola Vlasic earns derby draw with Juventus
